name: Frog Steps
description:
You're a frog, and you're very hungry, time to eat flies! But be careful, each step takes time, and if you run out of time, you won't be able to walk anymore!

Contains:

20 levels

Different kinds of lily pads/flies

Ultimate fly

Controls:

Walk - Arrows

Reset level - R

Special thanks to my sister for making the trailer! Here's her channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4naHIKCrIwgeuMnqyQggTg
